question: Which business activity sounds most interesting to you?

options.a: Tracking money going in and out of a company
options.b: Studying numbers to understand how a company is doing financially
options.c: Promoting products and understanding customer needs

options.a: Checking that financial records are correct and follow rules
options.b: Planning for future profits and budgets
options.c: Organizing projects to meet goals on time

question: What kind of problem do you like solving?

options.b: Figuring out the best way to spend or invest money
options.c: Getting people interested in a new product or service

question: Which role would suit you best in a company?

options.b: Analyzing trends to help with big financial decisions
options.c: Leading teams to complete business projects successfully

options.b: Planning ahead to avoid losses and grow profits
options.c: Creating messages that reach and excite customers

options.a: A quiet space reviewing financial documents and statements

options.c: A creative setting focused on customer campaigns and products

question: How do you prefer to contribute to a team?

options.a: By keeping financial records accurate and organized
options.b: By helping others make smart financial choices
options.c: By making sure tasks are completed on time and goals are met

question: What kind of project would excite you the most?

options.a: Auditing a company to ensure everything follows the rules
options.b: Creating a financial forecast for a new product
options.c: Designing a marketing plan to launch that product
